resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106108</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106108</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202536</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Goals, Goals, Goals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziele, Ziele, Ziele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Buts, Buts, Buts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Objetivos, Objetivos, Objetivos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Obiettivi, Obiettivi, Obiettivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στόχοι, στόχοι, στόχοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Metas, Metas, Metas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will be introduced to the benefits of goal-setting and the steps in the goal setting process. A group activity with a ball will give students practice in all steps of the process and an opportunity to see the benefits of setting goals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer werden zum Nutzen der 
Ziel-Einstellung und zu den Jobsteps im Ziel eingeführt, das Prozeß 
einstellt. Eine Gruppe Aktivität mit einer Kugel gibt 
Kursteilnehmern Praxis in allen Jobsteps des Prozesses und der 
Gelegenheit, den Nutzen der Einstellung von von Zielen zu sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des étudiants seront présentés aux avantages du
but-réglage et aux étapes dans le but plaçant le processus. 
Une activité de groupe avec une boule donnera à des étudiants
la pratique dans toutes les étapes du procédé et d'une occasion de 
voir les avantages de fixer des objectifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes serão introduzidos aos benefícios 
do objetivo-ajuste e às etapas no objetivo que ajusta o processo. 
Uma atividade do grupo com uma esfera dará a estudantes a 
prática em todas as etapas do processo e de uma oportunidade ver os 
benefícios de ajustar objetivos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi saranno introdotti a vantaggio di 
obiettivo-regolazione ed i punti nell'obiettivo che regola il 
processo. Un'attività del gruppo con una sfera darà ad allievi
la pratica a tutti i punti del modo e di un'occasione vedere i 
benefici di regolazione degli obiettivi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εισαχθούν στα οφέλη της στόχος-τιμής
τών παραμέτρων και τα βήματα στη θέτοντας διαδικασία στόχου. 
Μια δραστηριότητα ομάδας με μια σφαίρα θα δώσει την 
πρακτική σπουδαστών σε όλα τα βήματα της διαδικασίας και μιας 
ευκαιρίας να δουν τα οφέλη τους στόχους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducirán a los estudiantes a las ventajas de 
meta-fijar y a los pasos de progresión en la meta que fija proceso. 
Una actividad del grupo con una bola dará a estudiantes 
práctica en todos los pasos de progresión del proceso y de una 
oportunidad de considerar las ventajas de fijar metas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PAT NYSTROM
FN:PAT NYSTROM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106108</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/goals-goals-goals</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
